name: Remote-Ware-for-iphone
body:
### Do you have Children
Are they from a split family?

Do have that ex that is just trying to alienate your child from you?

Your child has a perfectly good phone, and the ex tells your child you don't have the right to know who they are talking to or where they are. He/She gets them a new phone, turns the power off to the phone you bought for your child and then blocked you from calling the new phone.

So now your child thinks your not calling, and there's no way for you to communicate with them.

**WHERE DID PARENTS GO?**

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

### Remotely push software on your child's phone that is on or off.

### Get control and order back.

### Listen and record to what your child is doing. (It is your right as a parent)


***
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
